text: Les Misérables is a 1952 American romantic drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and is based on the 1862 novel of the same name by Victor Hugo. It stars Michael Rennie, Debra Paget, Robert Newton, Sylvia Sidney, Edmund Gwenn and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1952 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Les Misérables (1952 movie)
